text:
e="preserve">Lawrence Franks Jr. (September 12, 1987 – June 25, 2020) better known by his stage name Huey, was an American rapper. At first, he signed to Jive Records. Franks was best known for his 2006 debut single, "Pop, Lock & Drop It". Huey was born in Kinloch, Missouri.
Huey was shot and killed on June 25, 2020 in Kinloch, aged 32.
